Module org.cojen.tupl
Package org.cojen.tupl.io

Interface PageCompressor

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
public interface PageCompressor
extends Closeable
Compresses and decompresses pages. Instances aren't expected to be thread-safe.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()  
    int compress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcLen)
    Compress to a byte array.
    int compress​(long srcPtr, int srcOff, int srcLen)
    Compress to a byte array from a raw memory pointer.
    byte[] compressedBytes()
    Target of the compress method.
    void decompress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, byte[] dst, int dstOff, int dstLen)
    Decompress to a byte array.
    void decompress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, long dstPtr, int dstOff, int dstLen)
    Decompress to a raw memory pointer.
    static PageCompressor lz4()
    Returns a new LZ4 compressor.
    static PageCompressor zlib()
    Returns a new ZLIB compressor (deflate).
    static PageCompressor zlib​(int level)
    Returns a new ZLIB compressor (deflate).

  • Method Details

    • zlib

      static PageCompressor zlib()
      Returns a new ZLIB compressor (deflate).

    • zlib

      static PageCompressor zlib​(int level)
      Returns a new ZLIB compressor (deflate).
      Parameters:
      level - compression level [0..9]

    • lz4

      static PageCompressor lz4()
      Returns a new LZ4 compressor.

    • compress

      int compress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcLen)
      Compress to a byte array.
      Returns:
      the compressed size

    • compress

      int compress​(long srcPtr, int srcOff, int srcLen)
      Compress to a byte array from a raw memory pointer.
      Returns:
      the compressed size

    • compressedBytes

      byte[] compressedBytes()
      Target of the compress method. The array is recycled, although it can be replaced.

    • decompress

      void decompress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, byte[] dst, int dstOff, int dstLen)
      Decompress to a byte array.
      Parameters:
      dstLen - original size of uncompressed page

    • decompress

      void decompress​(byte[] src, int srcOff, long dstPtr, int dstOff, int dstLen)
      Decompress to a raw memory pointer.
      Parameters:
      dstLen - original size of uncompressed page
